metadata.Title: CVE-2021-43303 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium.
metadata.Description: Buffer overflow in PJSUA API when calling pjsua_call_dump. An attacker-controlled 'buffer' argument may cause a buffer overflow, since supplying an output buffer smaller than 128 characters may overflow the output buffer, regardless of the 'maxlen' argument supplied

criterions.comment: asterisk: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
pjproject: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
